name: Solitaire: 300 Levels
description:
Solitaire: 300 Levels challenges your brain and keeps you witty! Endless amounts of fun to satisfy your leisurely or competitive solitaire needs.

FEATURES:
-Intuitive hints
-Undo moves
-One card draw or 3 card draw
-Timer
-Move counter
-Various card styles

ARCADE MODE:
-300 Levels of seemingly endless fun
-Receive one to three stars per level(Reach up 900 stars!)
-Stars per level are based on Time, Moves, Hints Used, Undo's Used and Quality of moves

CLASSIC MODE:
-Challenge yourself to beat previous high-scores
